plot: "Burglar Alarmed" A new burglar comes to Townsville and his first robbery is at the house of...The Powerpuff Girls?

Burglar Alarmed: The Powerpuff Girls are waiting for the Professor to tuck them in, but the girls see their father asleep in his lab and he has his dissertation tomorrow. The girls put the Professor in his bed so he can get plenty of rest. While the girls are asleep, an intruder comes to rob the house and the girls must stop the man from committing his crime. However, the burglar learns he is robbing the Powerpuff Girls and he tries to wake the Professor, but he gets defeated after being punched. Bubbles throws the intruder out. The robber notices Mojo's lair and he sets out to rob it. Shotgun Wedding: The Professor has been doing his research on Townsville's villains and criminals, he tries to figure out what kind of species Fuzzy is. The Professor goes to the forest to continue his research on Fuzzy, but he gets covered in mud and he gets held captive by Fuzzy who wants to marry the disguised Professor. The Powerpuff Girls must save the Professor from Fuzzy before he ties the knot, the girls defeat Fuzzy's family members and they save their father. Fuzzy makes out with his "wife" in his shack, much to the girls' and Professor's displeasure. The Professor decides to indefinitely end his research on Fuzzy.
